Hello!


Welcome to my page! I'm Theresa Cannon, a teacher at Ball High School in Galveston, TX. If you'd like to know more about me, check the Experience section.

For students: You'll be able to keep updated with my courses via the Courses section. Please click the Courses link at the top of the page and select your respective class.
